3500.name: A Dark Sewer Entrance
3500.description:
You stand at the entrance to Midgaard's ancient sewer system.
A rusty iron grate leads down into darkness, and the smell of decay
wafts up from below. Water drips from the ceiling, echoing in the
confined space. This appears to be the only way into the sewers from
the Thieves' Guild.

3501.name: A Narrow Sewer Tunnel
3501.description:
The tunnel is barely wide enough for a person to walk upright.
Slime covers the walls, and rats scurry away as you approach. A foul
stream of water flows slowly through the center of the passage. The
tunnel continues east and west.

3502.name: Sewer Junction
3502.description:
Four tunnels meet here in a small chamber. The ceiling is higher
here, and you can see ancient brickwork that has mostly crumbled away.
Water flows in from the north and continues south. Exits lead in all
four directions.

3503.name: The Rat King's Lair
3503.description:
This chamber reeks of decay and filth. Hundreds of rats swarm over
piles of refuse, and in the center sits a massive, bloated rat that
appears to be their king. The creature's eyes gleam with unnatural
intelligence. This is clearly a dangerous place.

3504.name: A Hidden Sewer Exit
3504.description:
A narrow passage leads up to a rusty grate. Daylight filters through
the gaps, and you can hear the sounds of the city above. This appears
to be an exit to the city streets. A ladder leads up through the grate.

3505.name: Flooded Sewer Passage
3505.description:
This section of the sewers is partially flooded. Dark water comes up
to your knees, and you can feel things brushing against your legs in
the murk. The passage continues north to what appears to be an exit,
and south back into the sewer system.

3506.name: A Fetid Pool
3506.description:
This chamber contains a large pool of stagnant, foul-smelling water.
Things move beneath the surface - you hope they're just fish. The walls
are covered in slime and algae. A passage leads north back into the
tunnel system.

3507.name: Narrow Side Tunnel
3507.description:
This cramped tunnel branches off from the main sewer. You have to
crouch to move through here. The walls are rough and unfinished,
suggesting this was a hastily dug passage. Rats nest in the cracks.

3508.name: Ancient Storage Chamber
3508.description:
This room was once used to store supplies for the city above. Now it's
filled with broken crates and rotting sacks. A few items of value might
still be hidden among the debris. Passages lead north and west.

3509.name: The Collector's Den
3509.description:
This chamber appears to be the lair of something that collects
shiny objects. Coins, bits of jewelry, and other trinkets are scattered
about. A large nest made of rags and stolen goods sits in one corner.
Whatever lives here is clearly territorial.

3500.name: a sewer rat
3500.long_desc: A large rat with matted fur scurries around, looking for food.

3501.name: a giant centipede
3501.long_desc: A massive centipede with glistening chitin crawls along the walls.

3502.name: the Rat King
3502.long_desc: An enormous, bloated rat with malevolent intelligence in its eyes.

3503.name: a slime creature
3503.long_desc: A blob of animated slime oozes across the floor.

3504.name: a filthy scavenger
3504.long_desc: A ragged figure picks through refuse, collecting shiny objects.
